data.title: University of Massachusetts Athletics
data.meta_description: Mike Sullivan (40) Long-Stick Midfielder - 2018 • Junior (at Massachusetts) • Made one appearance on the season, doing so against NJIT (3/10) 2017 • Sophomor...
data.text:
2018 • Junior (at Massachusetts)

• Made one appearance on the season, doing so against NJIT (3/10)

2017 • Sophomore (at Massachusetts) • Did not see game action

2016 • Freshman (at Siena College) • Appeared in nine games as a reserve

• Totaled 12 groundballs on the year

• Attempted two shots

• First appearance was at No. 7 Syracuse (2/13) during the season-opener

• Grabbed a groundball and attempted a shot at Mercer (2/23)

• Helped the Saints down UMass Lowell (2/27) with a groundball

• Picked up a groundball against Canisius (3/19) and Quinnipiac (3/26)

• Totaled three groundballs against Marist (4/9)

• Earned his second three-groundball game and fired his second shot of the season at Hartford (4/16)

• Secured two groundballs at No. 5 Albany (4/26)

Before Massachusetts • Three-time Hockomock League All-Star at Franklin High School

BostonLax All-American

• Third Annual STX BostonLax All-American Game participant in 2015

• Named a Boston Globe All-Scholastic and Metro West Daily News First Team All-Star following junior season, in which the defenseman added 18 goals and four assists

• 2013 Underlcassman of the Year and Eastern Mass All-Star

Personal • Son of Pat and Jeanne Sullivan

• Has two sisters Alexandra and Olivia
